price: İşte, böyle... Onlardan öncekilere de bir elçi gelmedi ki ona sihirbaz veya mecnun dememiş olsunlar.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ مَآ أَتَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا قَالُواْ سَاحِرٌ أَوۡ مَجۡنُونٌ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadhālika mā atā alladhīna min qablihim min rasūlin illā qālū sāḥirun aw majnūnun
